title: (x) Script Font Id? / 'Happy Valentines' - Jellyka, Saint-Andrew's Queen {Florian}
content:
Hi, does anybody know this script font?

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203081008im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1_4255.jpg)
author: simundo

comments.content:
Hi Simon,

it’s a freebie called ‘Jellyka, Saint-Andrew's Queen’.  
F

We had this as another request recently with a different sample. Jellyka Nerevan has done a number of handwriting scripts in addition to [St Andrew's Queen](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203081008/http:/www.dafont.com/jellyka-saint-andrews-queen.font).

- Mike Yanega
